term: What does Burr now do? Who did he talk with?
content:
burr begins another set of conspiracies, this time regarding the new western territory louisiana
	nothing was ever written down, and burr told so many conflicting stories that we today still arenâ€™t sure exactly what he was up to
regardless, he was surreptitiously corresponding with people that he had no responsibility corresponding with

burr talked to the governor of louisiana, james wilkinson
burr also talked to anthony mary, the british ambassador

1805 comes around and he is not VP anymore, and he goes down the ohio river
he sails down from the ohio to the mississippi where he can go to new orleans and find this co-conspirator, james wilkinson
